select i.id as iid, i.nombre as inombre, i.descripcion as idescripcion, i.fechalanzamiento as ifechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia as itarifaxdia, i.formatorenta as iformatorenta, i.genero as igenero, ti.id as tiid, ti.descripcion as tidescripcion FROM VI_ITEMS as i left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id left join VI_ITEMRENTADO as re on re.ITEMS_id=i.id WHERE re.id IS NULL;

select i.id as iid, i.nombre as inombre, i.descripcion as idescripcion, i.fechalanzamiento as ifechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia as itarifaxdia, i.formatorenta as iformatorenta, i.genero as igenero, ti.id as tiid, ti.descripcion as tidescripcion FROM VI_ITEMS as i left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id
where i.id=#{iditem};
select i.tarifaxdia * #{num} as itarifaxdia FROM VI_ITEMS as i WHERE i.id = #{iditem};
mapper.update: update VI_ITEMS set tarifaxdia = #{tarifa} where id = #{iditem};
